Virus!
Avira antivir found trojan. It was a dll file, and an other file. I removed them, and the game works perfecctly after it, so it wasnt the part of the game. 
Not a false alarm, and not the crack. Please don't install game without antivirus.

Just in case anyone else is having problems, once you have installed the game you need to copy the files from the 'crack' folder on the iso into your game folder, overwriting the existing files there.
I copied the files in the "crack" folder to my installed game folder, overwrote the existing files, though I still can't get the game to run.  Does anyone have any suggestions?
